Weddings & Events
954-389-2100 ext 104
HOURS OF OPERATIONS
Golf Shop: Mon-Sun Opens at 7:00 AM
Driving Range: Opens at 7:00 AM
DIRECTIONS
From 595 West onto 75 North:
Take the Weston Rd Exit going West on to State Rd 84, about a 1/4 mile to Bonaventure Blvd., Turn Left. Course will be on your left.
From 75 North or South:
Exit Royal Palm West, go approx 1.5 miles, at light Bonaventure Blvd Turn Right, go approx 2.5 miles, go past Saddle Club Rd, entrance is 1/3 mile on your Right.
From 869 (Sawgrass):
Take 75 South, exit Royal Palm West go approx 1.5 miles to Bonaventure Blvd, Turn Right, Follow for approx 2.5 miles, go past Saddle Club Rd, entrance is 1/3 mile on your right.

Weddings & Events: Press 2
contact@golfbonaventure.com
Here at Bonaventure Golf Club we pride ourselves on the high quality of magnificent golf, superb amenities and outstanding service that we offer our valued customers. We have worked hard over the years to become a staple of the community, and in the process we have earned recognition as one of the region’s premier golf experiences.

(954) 389-2100
Book a Tee Time
Event Facilities
UNFORGETTABLE WEDDINGS & RECEPTIONS
The Bonaventure County Club features two gorgeous rooms overlooking the finishing hole of our newly renovated golf course and is surrounded by lush vegetation and beautiful lakes that  are abundant with Florida’s natural wildlife.
The “Vista Room” offers a hardwood dance floor with 2 large chandeliers. This room supports up to 145 guests. The “Vista Room” has double doors to walk out to a spacious outdoor patio with views of the 18th hole and water.
The “Garden Room” holds up to 85 guests and has large panel windows throughout giving you the most inspiring views of our 18th finishing hole on the golf course.
The “Private Bar / lounge” is open for rent for your special event.
Please call for more information (954) 389-2100 “Press 2”
